name: Score Attack Ninja 2
description:
Score Attack Ninja is back! After saving the castles from evil monsters its time for a well deserved rest. But not long after, an army of monsters can be seen marching towards the kingdom! Its up to one brave ninja and his magic ninja stars to save the kingdom once again!

Score Attack Ninja 2 is all about fast paced shoot-em-up action! Your task is to run to the goal at the end of each stage but monsters will keep getting in your way until you have destroyed enough of them and reached the stage goal score. Sound easy? Well each goal is guarded with a powerful guardian who will test your ninja skills! Defeat it and its on to the next stage!

Controls:

Enter: Start game/shoot

A: Move left

D: Move right

Esc: Exit game
